definitions: the practice of brushing and cleaning the coat of a horse, dog, or other animal

examples.text: regular grooming is essential to the well-being of your dog

shortDefinitions: practice of brushing and cleaning coat of animal

definitions: the practice by an animal of cleaning its own or another animal's fur or skin

examples.text: mutual grooming expresses the friendly relationship between cats

shortDefinitions: practice by animal of cleaning own or another animal's fur or skin

definitions: the practice of keeping a neat and tidy appearance

examples.text: she pays great attention to grooming and clothes

shortDefinitions: practice of keeping neat and tidy appearance

definitions: the action by a pedophile of preparing a child for a meeting, especially via an internet chat room, with the intention of committing a sexual offense

examples.text: online grooming has become a growing cause for concern

shortDefinitions: action by paedophile of preparing child for meeting with intention of committing sexual offence
